sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {ActivatedRoute, Router} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-task', templateUrl: './task.component.html', styleUrls: ['./task.component.css'] }) export class TaskComponent { constructor(private router: Router, private route: ActivatedRoute) { } addNewTask() { this.router.navigate(['new'], {relativeTo: this.route}); } }
Task name Task Description Task Priority Actions
Apple MacBook Pro 17" Silver Laptop
Microsoft Surface Pro White Laptop PC
Magic Mouse 2 Black Accessories
